thread.title: Kiran Juneja Sippy and Tarun Sarda host fun afternoon at Celebrating Vivaha 2015 in Mumbai
thread.title_full: Kiran Juneja Sippy and Tarun Sarda host fun afternoon at Celebrating Vivaha 2015 in Mumbai - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Kiran Juneja Sippy and Tarun Sarda host fun afternoon at Celebrating Vivaha 2015 in Mumbai
text:
Kiran Juneja Sippy and Tarun Sarda hosted an afternoon of revelry and fun for the city's swish set at Celebrating Vivaha 2015.
The elegant afternoon was followed by an exclusive showcase of designer wear and electric aroma burners by Kiran to light up the festive season and support a charitable cause. She said, "I am delighted that Tarun gave me an opportunity to showcase an assortment of festive irresistibles curated by me, with which I was able to support my charitable cause that serves as a platform to showcase various forms art and artists of Indian origin. Be it sculptors, painters, singers, musicians or any other form of artistry, each will be promoted through this cause."
Added Tarun Sarda (CEO, Celebrating Vivaha), "The response to the exhibition was overwhelming as we saw a lot of buyers coming to shop. We are now gearing up for the winter edition of Celebrating Vivaha from November 20 to 23 at JW Marriott where we have an interesting line-up of designers launching their collections for next year."
Those attending the event included Sheena Sippy, Poonam Dhillon, Padmini Kolhapure, Bhagyashree, Sheeba, Queenie Singh, Sapna Mukherjee, Zeba Kohli, Aarti Surendranath, Sheeba, Reshma Merchant, and several others.
